name: cypress-e2e
description: Cypress End to End Project learning

scripts.runTest: npx cypress run --headed --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/6-fill-form.cy.ts cypress/e2e/9-radio.cy.ts
scripts.mochawesome-merge: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.runTestAndGetReport: npm run delete-mochawesome-json && npm run delete-results && npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run runTest && npm run mochawesome-merge

author: suro
